text: We're going to show you
how to clean your iPad screen safely.
To clean your iPad,

you're going to need a
microfiber cleaning cloth
and some water.

Before you start, make
sure your iPad isn't
plugged into any devices or power outlets.
Turn your iPad to sleep mode
by pressing on the power button here,

or you can power it off
completely by holding it down.

Do not spray water
directly onto your iPad.

Instead, dampen your
cloth ever so slightly.

It's safer to use water
than any household cleaners,
which may damage your screen.
With small, circular motions,

use the damp cloths to
clean the iPad screen.

Don't use the cloth to clean
the perimeter of the iPad,
as you want to ensure that no moisture
gets into the openings of the device.

Instead, use a completely
dry, lint-free cloth
to clean the screen's perimeter.
